name: Wigwam Attain Repreve Midweight Quarter Socks - Unisex
description: Dry feet means no blisters. These medium-weight running socks use Ultimax technology to move sweat to the top of the sock where it can more easily evaporate. An antimicrobial treatment keeps these socks smelling fresh so you can wear them longer and wash them less.Nylon, Repreve® polyester, Hydrotec polyester and spandex fabric blend wicks moisture to keep your feet dry and blister-free.Sole is smooth Repreve® polyester made from recycled plastic bottles.Hydrotec™ polyester pulls moisture into fabric and spreads it evenly for rapid evaporation.Breathable mesh instep vents excess heat.Seamless toe construction for a chafe-free run.
